page.title: 12Springfield River
page.content: The {River Eden}starts at Kinross and flows near Springfield and comes out to the north of St. Andrews into the North Sea. You can buy permits at J.A Stewart's in Cupar for Â£1.This allows you to fish as a{recreation}on certain stretches of the Eden. The name of the club is{Eden Angling Association}. The season starts midnight on March 14th to October 6th. It is illegal to fish on Sundays and it is forbidden to keep salmon under 12 inches, sea trout under 10 inches and brown trout under 8 inches. The salmon season is from February to November. You can spin fish, bait fish and fly fish. If you catch a fish you can take the hook out with a disgorger only if the fish has swallowed the hook. If you go fly fishing you have to choose a good fly which is probably the Black Spider.
